snippet: The annual presentation of Chanel-owned specialist ateliers placed front and center in Mr. Lagerfeld’s designs saluted an idealized version of Paris.
abstract: Karl Lagerfeld's 13th Metiers d’Art collection for Chanel is inspired by Left Bank neighborhood of Paris in 1960s.
lead_paragraph: The annual presentation of Chanel-owned specialist ateliers placed front and center in Mr. Lagerfeld’s designs saluted an idealized version of Paris.

headline.print_headline: Lagerfeld Visits Rome for a Salute to Paris
headline.main: Karl Lagerfeld Creates a Homage to Paris in Rome
